item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: December 12, 2022 Today's Verse Psalm 90:2 [2] Before the mountains were brought forth, or ever you had formed the earth and the world, from everlasting to everlasting you are God. Today's Memory Verse Ephesians 6:12 - For we do not wrestle against flesh and blood, but against the rulers, against the authorities, against the cosmic powers over this present darkness, against the spiritual forces of evil in the heavenly places.
